column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The buttery crust is a fan favorite and deservedly so
column2: but what makes Lou's so delicious is it's minimalism
column3: a paradoxical assessment of deep dish pizza.  They limit your pizza toppings and it's the right direction.  Savor the quality ingredients instead of sensory overload of too much cheese (Giordanos) or overwrought tomato sauce (Pizzeria Uno).
